text: 21.8 Mat 25.41, Epe 5.5, 1 Ti 1.9, Hib 12.14, Lep 19.20, 20.14-15, 21.27, 22.15 Pen binbɨ yɨp gos ma nepal okok, binɨb pɨlɨkɨl yɨp kelɨg abal okok, binɨb gach tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨpal okok, binɨb chɨp ñapal okok, binɨb bin si bɨ si dɨpal okok, binɨb kuj gɨpal okok, binɨb tap yepɨs okok kɨlop agnepal okok, binɨb yepɨs gɨnɨgun agɨl nepal okok, mɨdupsek am man kɨli ak yenɨgabal, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ salpa sek yɨneb mɨgan ak. Binɨb wakay anɨb ak abal okok, tepayaŋ kubal apun.
